mapper.select: select yyy.*, rs.description as status, rt.description as type from (select json_extract_path_text(yy.xx, 'id') as rw_uuid, json_extract_path_text(yy.xx, 'code') as code, json_extract_path_text(yy.xx, 'description') as description, json_extract_path_text(yy.xx, 'properties', 'pm_review_start_time') as start_time from (select json_array_elements((metadata->'cycle'->'reviews')::json) xx from pm_process_metadata where rt_process_uuid = #{processUuid}) yy) yyy left join review rw on rw.uuid = yyy.rw_uuid::uuid join review_status rs on rw.status_id = rs.id join review_type rt on rw.type_id = rt.id
